room_title: Escape room "Professor's Study" by Enter The Enigma in Colorado Springs
review: My wife and I were on our anniversary and this was the first escape room we have ever been to and we had a ton of fun. Highly recommend. The owners are fantastic.

room_title: Escape room "Professor's Study" by Enter The Enigma in Colorado Springs
review: My arranged for a group of my family members to do The Professor's Study Escape Room while we were in the area for our reunion. Don was very responsive to my emails and provided excellent service as well as military discount for my group. My family thoroughly enjoyed themselves and were able to escape the room! We had a blast and would certainly visit again if we're in the area.
